caption.body: Canadian director Nathan Boey orchestrates forty animators from forty countries uniting with the same directive—the creation of a 3-second animation of a ball that is then passed to a fellow animator in another country and to pick up where you left off.   See “Pass the Ball” by Nathan Boey in the Video Arts Gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal with daily operating hours of 5:00am to 10:00pm, or online at: https://bit.ly/3rrB9cx
caption.excerpt: Canadian director Nathan Boey orchestrates forty animators from forty countries uniting with the same directive—the creation of a 3-second animation of a ball that is then passed to a fellow animator in another country and to pick up where you left off.
